comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Retired at last:  Thanks for pointing out the date on this photograph (11/16/18).  As Wystan points out it may reflect the date of later publication by the Bain News Service. We will add it to the image description.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The Gallica site doesn't have this photo, but it has the one prior in the Agence Meurisse series, 55087, showing a farm burned by the Germans at Choisy au Bac, and lists a publication date of 1914. gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90419729
